I don't consider it reverse NTR or cheating because:
1. they are not in a relationship and the girl only realizes that she likes the guy because of ch.3
2. she was well aware and has always known that he and his father have sexual interactions with the maids
3. he only has sex/gets blowjobs from them and there is no indication that he or the maids see as anything more than a physical relationship
4. in ch.4 they seem to be getting together and it seems to be more intimate then with the maids
Now I only skimmed through it and read a bit of ch. 2 and 3 so I might be wrong on some points but this is what it seems like to me
It's only pt. 3 that's reverse NTR/cheating, and since they make up in pt. 4 it's not that bad. You could just skip ch. 3 (when it gets translated) and read 1, 2, and 4.

@Chetti
We can continue this conversation when you are ready to speak respectfully.

Is not reverse NTR at all dumbfucks, to be reverse NTR she needs to be in love with the MaMC, which she is not, she was willingly let his father has sex with her, his father only let her do it with his son, would you imagine a girl in love with a boy doesn't feel bothered by the thought of having sex with his father? the doujin only state that they are childhood friends nothing more nothing less, it doesn't imply love, she even knows that since childhood he and his father had had sex with sexual slave maids and they have a normal friendship, so why would be reverse NTR is she doesn't feel love for him? sure she is developing some kind of sexual desire but does it...
good shit. theres no black people and jews involved. adding to my favorites
My point wasn't to argue about if reverse ntr or ntr was necessary, I just wanted to say pt. 3 wasn't wholesome. Pt.4 does have a good ending, Mc and Girl go all the way and they make up after pt. 3.

@hentaiaccountant Anyway I really didn't want to start a flame war . I only wanted you to understand my point , nothing more nothing less so let's end it here like normal people . If you see me on another comment section don't forget to say hi !!!!!

@hentaiaccountant There are literally other people on this chat that tell you it's not NTR  and you are calling me a minority ? .  Many many more people care about the difference it is just that you haven't met many people judging by that 1 month old account of yours who care about the difference . For your information even one of the  major doujin sites I use like FAKKU , call the reverse NTR as ''cheating'' and not NTR .

I can kinda understand why he'd call it (gyaku) NTR Our Heroine watches him have sex with the two maids while she masturbates, but it looks like it gets back on track in Chapter 4 ( found here: https://nhentai.net/g/359993/327/ ). There is another chapter coming up, but I suspect it isn't released yet. Also in Ch 3 he looks like he was drugged or is a hentai-level deep sleeper.

@hentaiaccountant Please don't spouting nonsense . Where did I ever say it was ok because it was reverse NTR ? It is equally bad but when people read your half baked comment they are gonna think things that simply  don't happen . You said it was NTR and not reverse ntr or cheating .
What's the difference if it's NTR or Reverse NTR? Does changing the gender make it any more or less ok? I was referring to it not being wholesome, and the type of NTR it is doesn't matter.
@hentaiaccountant To add to that , the maids don't even initiate a relationship with the guy , he just have sex with them  , that's why I said ''or cheating'' on my original comment

"Reverse ntr" is still ntr, dude fucks his other two maids while his childhood friend watches in pt. 3, and she clearly isn't ok with it. Just because it's happening to the girl doesn't mean it's not ntr.
